title: Focused Shockwave Therapy (LI-ESWT)
tagline: Rebuild Blood Flow with Targeted Acoustic Energy
description: Low-intensity shockwaves stimulate angiogenesis and nerve repair to restore natural erections.
longDescription: Focused shockwave therapy (LI-ESWT) uses acoustic pulses to break down micro-plaque, recruit growth factors, and trigger new vessel formation inside penile tissue. Unlike pills that mask symptoms, shockwave regenerates the vascular pathways required for spontaneous erections.\n\nAt Dr. SNA Clinic we combine LI-ESWT with Doppler diagnostics, personalised treatment mapping, and optional P-Shot® or peptide protocols for lasting gains in rigidity, sensitivity, and confidence.

seo.metaTitle: Shockwave Therapy for Erectile Dysfunction London | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Drug-free shockwave therapy in London to treat erectile dysfunction and Peyronie’s disease. Course from £350/session. Doctor-led men’s health clinic.
seo.h1: Shockwave Therapy for Male Intimate Health

hero.headline: Drug-Free Regeneration for ED
hero.subheadline: Precision shockwave therapy that re-opens blood vessels and boosts responsiveness.

overview.title: What Is LI-ESWT?
overview.content: Low-intensity extracorporeal shockwave therapy (LI-ESWT) delivers mechanical pulses that create controlled micro-trauma inside the corpora cavernosa. This stimulates endothelial repair, nitric oxide release, and stem cell activation—key mechanisms for healthy erections. Our protocol targets the crura, shaft, and glans to ensure uniform vascular regeneration.
highlights: Recommended by European Association of Urology for mild-to-moderate ED

treatsAreas.title: Treatment Zones
treatsAreas.subtitle: Energy delivered along every vascular pathway

areas.description: Breaks down fibrotic scar tissue when combined with traction.

howItWorks.title: Science Behind Shockwave Therapy
howItWorks.subtitle: Acoustic energy drives a healing cascade
howItWorks.content: Shockwaves create micro-cavitation bubbles that collapse and trigger cellular signalling. This process releases VEGF, eNOS, and proliferative cytokines while dissolving micro-plaque that restricts penile blood flow.

benefits.title: Angiogenesis

benefits.description: Breaks down fibrotic tissue linked to Peyronie’s curvature.

benefits.title: Synergy with PRP

testimonials.name: Anthony L.
testimonials.text: By the fourth session morning erections were back and I no longer panic about intimacy. The course was painless and the team was incredibly discreet.

testimonials.name: Daniel W.
testimonials.text: Curvature dropped from 35° to under 15° after combining shockwave with traction and PRP. Follow-up imaging proved the plaque shrinkage.

faq.question: Does shockwave therapy hurt?
faq.answer: Most patients describe a light tapping sensation. Energy levels are adjustable and we can pause at any time.

faq.question: When will I see results?
faq.answer: Many men notice stronger erections after 3-4 sessions, with maximal gains 8-12 weeks after completing the course.

faq.question: Can I combine it with medication?
faq.answer: Yes. PDE5 inhibitors can be used during the course and often become optional once vascular health improves.

faq.question: Is it safe with heart conditions?
faq.answer: If your cardiologist has cleared you for sexual activity, shockwave is usually safe. We still review all medications and history first.

faq.question: How long do results last?
faq.answer: Expect 12-24 months depending on lifestyle factors. Maintenance sessions can be scheduled annually.

faq.question: Will insurance cover it?
faq.answer: Shockwave is considered elective, so we provide itemised invoices for personal reimbursement if available.
